StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.waitingTime
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The time in milliseconds to wait after a server was passivated before trying to activate it again. This parameter is very important. It is advised to set it for a long period of time. If a server passivated it means that it timed out for X times. This means it is something fatal. It is advised to set this value for at least 60000 milliseconds (1 minute)

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.numberOfAttempts
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The number of times to try and call a server before it will be passivated. Each server will be called several times in case of a failure to be sure that it failed for something that was not random

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.retryDelay
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The time in milliseconds to wait between retries. In order to make sure that the server is not temporarily unstable or maybe failed due to a random reason we wait for X milliseconds and try again. It is advised to set a small number here (no more than 1000-5000 milliseconds)

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.readTimeout
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The time to wait before request is time out in the client

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.connectTimeout
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The time to wait before timeouting an attemp to establish a new connection

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.maxConnectionsPerAddress
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The maximum connections kept open per address (address is a server hot:port pair)

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.maxConnectionsTotal
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The maximum connections kept in total. Relevant in Apache client only

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.maxQueueSizePerAddress
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The maximum queue size of pending requests when all connections in the pool are currently used

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.maxClientThreads
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The maximum number of threads a client will open to handle the async requests

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.monitoringBaseUri
StructureMemberDefinition.description: A list of base Uri's . If the list is not empty the infrastructure will try and match the base uri with the actual uri. if found the base uri will be the monitoring service/api name.

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.exposeStatisticsToMonitor
StructureMemberDefinition.description: Set to true if you wnt to monitor client connections.

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.keyStorePath
StructureMemberDefinition.description: the path to the keystore file.

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.keyStorePassword
StructureMemberDefinition.description: the password to the keystore file.

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.trustStorePath
StructureMemberDefinition.description: the path to the trust-store file.

StructureMemberDefinition.name: http.trustStorePassword
StructureMemberDefinition.description: the password to the trust-store file.
